comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Creative Imagery (Fav 1,Comment on 1), and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 76462928@N00
comment._content: "S M VOR DEM REGIMENTSHAUS DES 1 GARDE-REGIMENTS." That is: "Seine Majestät vor dem Regimentshaus des 1. Garde-Regiments", in translation: "His Majesty in front of the regiment house of the first guard regiment"
